DescriptionData.Title: Wolfe Jumbo PearlFace Paint Crayons (6/box)
DescriptionData.Description:
Wolf Novelties Jumbo Pearl Face Painting Crayons from Wolfe, the leader in face paints, are easy to apply and easy to remove. These crayons are perfect for kids to use on each other, no mess, no cleaning brushes or wiping away paint. Just use like any crayon.
The Jumbo Wolfe Pearl Face Paint Crayon set includes silver, gold, rose, green, blue and black.
Wolfe makeup is water based, making it easy to apply and remove--just use soap and water. Wolfe makeup is safe and non-toxic. Since it is water based it is less likely to smear or rub off and is comfortable to wear. It will last longer than most other face painting crayons. Paint faces in the morning of the school fair and they'll stay on until the end.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 6 color Wolfe Neon Jumbo Face Painting Crayon Set is good for about 75-400 applications
The Jumbo Wolfe Pearl Face Paint Crayon set includes silver, gold, rose, green, blue and black (note: the FDA recommends against using red, green, and purple around the eyes and blue on the lips)
Long lasting, easy to apply and easy to remove; just use soap and water
Perfect for kids; they can participate in the face painting!
Parrafin wax and glycerine based, less likely to smear or rub off
